collidascope.collidahandla

Class Handler

  • Object
    • Handler

  • public class Handler
extends Object
    A class used to handle collisions between two colliders. The handler relies on the client's programmed functions to provide the logic to carry out the collision response for the specific colliders.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk Created on 5/22/2015.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Handler()
      Constructs the handler with an empty container for client specified resolution functionality.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHandlers(List<String> keys, List<BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider>> handlers)
      Adds collision handler functionality to the collider.
      void addHandlers(Map<String,BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider>> handlers)
      Adds the mapped handler functions to the Handler.
      void handleCollision(ICollider a, ICollider b, String key)
      Handles a collision between two colliders immediately.
      void handleCollisions(Iterator<Collision> iterator)
      Applies the handler functionality to each collision in the iterator.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addHandlers

        public void addHandlers(List<String> keys,
                        List<BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider>> handlers)
        Adds collision handler functionality to the collider.
        Parameters:
        keys - The keys to map to.
        handlers - The handlers to be mapped.

      • addHandlers

        public void addHandlers(Map<String,BiConsumer<ICollider,ICollider>> handlers)
        Adds the mapped handler functions to the Handler.
        Parameters:
        handlers - The map

      • handleCollision

        public void handleCollision(ICollider a,
                            ICollider b,
                            String key)
        Handles a collision between two colliders immediately.
        Parameters:
        a - The first collider.
        b - The second collider.
        key - The key for the handler function.

      • handleCollisions

        public void handleCollisions(Iterator<Collision> iterator)
        Applies the handler functionality to each collision in the iterator.
        Parameters:
        iterator - The collision iterator.
